review: Doctor patiently explained the cause and prescribed the medicines. Also explained about each medicine and its uses.

My 4 Yrs old daughter was having fever for 2-3 days which did not drop down after home medication (Paracetamol). So I was searching for pediatrician in my locality and  I came to know about Dr. Harikah through google reviews given by other Parents.  *** ** ** ********* ****** *** *** ****** * *** ** ******** her diagnosis is such that, she tries to avoid too much of medication unless it is very much needed and she is open and transparent on the Kids health. Additional she is quick in identifying  your Kids strength and motivate parents in raising their kids on their strength.

She guided us on the right path and on right time to admit my kid in a hospital for illness which apparently saved my kid life and health. Me and my entire family is so thankful to the Dr. Harikah. I would strongly recommend her the parents who is looking for Very humble/good pediatrician.

I have been consulting Dr. Harikah for my kid since last one year. All vaccinations were done in her clinic only. I highly recommend her for paediatric consultancy and I have reason for it.
She is very attentive, analytical & investigate in nature. Because of her advise, my kid came out from illness and our family is really thankful for her help.
She is quite approachable and concerned about her patients. 
Best thing is that she is honest. I recall an instance when my kid was having small smegma and I showed it to her. She was not looking much confident at that moment but later on she researched about it and has given advise.
Visited Dr. Harika for my son's illness at Neo clinic, she quickly diagnosed and provided adequate solutions and medicine. Doctor was very friendly and thorough in her procedures.

We have been consulting Doctor Harihak for our son and daughter for the past 1 year. She is very patient and regulars follows up after consultation to see how kids are doing. She is available at any time to answer our queries and concerns. She is extremely kind with the kids and treats them very well. She prescribes absolutely essential medicines only.
We strongly recommend Doctor Harihak.

********** ** *** ** *** **** ************* **** * **** **** *******.she is passionate about her work.She cares about her patients besides being readily available for them which differentiates her from others.Also, the parenting tips and guidance provided by her has been of a great help for me.She is gem of a person and I am grateful to her for her help.I highly recommend her.

I strongly recommend Dr Harikah Pedeatrician. I have been consulting the doctor for my son's vaccinations and general checkups. 

Extremely attentive, generous, thorough in her process of making observations. Dr. Harikah is very detailed in her prescription writing as well which includes all her observations noted. She gave me a lot of ideas and inputs on improving motor skills of my son. Infact all her inputs have helped us. Every visit to her has only been beneficial to us. 

Dr. Harikah is approachable and is concerned for her patients. I am extremely satisfied that I made a right choice of pediatrician.
reply_text: Your words are very encouraging, Thank u so much

review: She is very polite , patient to listen,addresses all the problem. Very happy to have met her today. Best.
Awesome experience .Doctor was so helpful and easily accessible even after the consultation for any doubts.More over kids are satisfied due to the friendly talks.
We consulted doctor recently for my son. She is very polite and listen to our problem calmly. She prescribed only required medicines. *** ** **** **** ****** **** ** ********** **** *******
